name: Witch Command
description:
As missiles and torches rain down on the houses of Peaceville, command the local residents to fight back!

Protect their homes from the scourge of industry in this fast paced arcade title.

Only you can command the forces under Goody Jones to fight back against the wily Matthew Hopkins, and keep the town of Peaceville the idyllic place it has always been.

Collect spell ingredients in the main game, then use these to craft various spells in the Witch Shack!

Create a powerful shield to protect your houses from the fiery torches raining down!

Slow down time to make taking out the pesky missiles easier!

Destroy all incoming missiles in one go!

Can you use your powers to save the Good Sisters!

NOTE: 30/12/20 - Uploaded new version to fix a couple of small gameplay elements and bugs found. Please download the new version for these updates.
